pages.text: $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs/ice-fire-dragonsteel-weaponry)I&F Dragonsteel Arsenal$()$(br2)DE4THR4SH’s personal retexture for dragonsteel weaponry, weapons and armor. It even adds glowing eyes to the eyes on the armor, but if you don’t like that kind of thing, there is a non-glowing version.
